archimate:BusinessService.name: Party Authentication
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
: Example of use:
A customer is authenticated making contact through a channel General comment:
Currently authentication is a cross channel capability that may use any device/tag or secret information to authenticate a party. Channel or device specific variations may be required. It is assumed a number of authentication levels will be defined for a deployment
Business Purpose : A cross channel capability that provides contact verification for a customer accessing the bank
: Пример использования:
Клиент аутентифицируется, устанавливая контакт через канал Общее замечание:
В настоящее время аутентификация является кросс-канальной возможностью, которая может использовать любое устройство / метку или секретную информацию для аутентификации стороны. Изменения канала или прибора специфические могут необходимы. Предполагается, что для развертывания будет определено несколько уровней проверки подлинности
деловая цель Возможность кросс-канала, который обеспечивает проверку контакта для клиента, обращающегося в банк
Service Domain - Party Authentication Customer authentication is a cross-channel/device capability that provides identity confirmation for customers accessing the bank through any interactive channel. The service may use a combination of one or more mechanisms to authenticate including issued tokens/devices, virtual mechanisms such as passwords and bio-metrics such as voice/face recognition. Different levels of authentication may be determined to support different types of access and there may be access permissions associated with the authentication mechanism used.
Detailed Summary This service domain provides a customer identify authentication service covering all channels and devices to support access to the banks products and services.
Executive Summary This service domain provides a customer identify authentication service covering all channels and devices to support access to the banks products and services.
Examples Of Use A customer is authenticated when making phone contact with the bank's service center.
